Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory188.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...What a long detour. Looks like Roland deliberately laid those trails to mislead us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But no matter what, his trails vanished here. That's for sure.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "There's a... hatch, hidden on the foundation wall...?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The trail ends before a hidden hatch on the foundation wall. Looks like Roland went through the hatch.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Got it. Cracking it open, now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv, run a full scan.', 3: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Just a common industrial grade airlock. Door's open.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Wait! Lee! Don't move!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv gives a startled cry, and Lee immediately stops the movement of his hands.'}
{2: "What's the matter?", 3: '18'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant... Every meter down the hatch, the viral density spirals exponentially.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's already at dead zone levels. If we open the door now, Commandant, you will die from the virus within five minutes.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '****! How in the blazes can the viral density differ so much above and below ground?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Did they lay this entire freakin' place with partition tiles?! Talk about burning money!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Now scanning... It's just like what Karenina said.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'You wot?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Can Constructs withstand this level of density?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "No, I'm already reading higher density levels than most dead zones. It's not something an Inver-Device can offset!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's almost... as if someone had maliciously concentrated all the nearby virus underground.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Just like that fishy Ascendant in Kowloong...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Yeah. The Ascendant who can freely control the viral density near her. Quite the hassle to deal with...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "If that's the case, we can't do anything about it...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Hey, forgetting someone?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'That nerd... Asimov told me something before the operationâ€”what Roland buried in the deepest recesses of my mind is something like an Ascnet terminal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Which means that, I should be able to move freely even in high viral density areas, just like them.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...That, might indeed work.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "To make sure Kamui's safe. Our interests are aligned, temporarily.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'You owe me one for this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Hmph, thank me when it's all over.", 4: '1'}
